subject: Product has not been delivered
description_text:
Hi

I ordered a product on the 26th of november and have still not received it.
When looking at the tracking provided it shows the product as being in
transit ( screenshot provided). It has shown this message since the 7th
of December. I have contacted the shipping company but have yet to receive
an email back
[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text:
Hi

I am still yet to receive a reply on this matter

Hi Connor Craven,    I apologize for the delayed response. I noticed your package has been held for quite some time. Please contact Royal Mail to update the delivery address: IM4420001405  https://www.royalmail.com/track-your-item#/tracking-results/IW270734817GB

Hi

Unfortunately it looks like the royal mail have possibly lost the package.
I have already exhausted all options on my end on trying to speak to
someone about finding the package but have been unsuccessful in doing so

Hi

The pedals have arrived. Thank you for all of your help
